concept.title: Solr
concept.shortdesc: The Solr destination writes data to a Solr node or cluster.

conbody.p: Solr destinationoverviewdestinationsSolrWhen you configure the Solr destination, you configure connection information for the node or cluster. You can configure the destination to index records individually or in batches.
You map incoming fields to Solr fields, and configure the action that the destination takes if any of the incoming fields are missing in the record.
When necessary, you can enable the destination to use Kerberos authentication.
